title: Bright Racing Shocks F929 xCO is an inverted carbon XC fork with 46mm diameter legs
content:
Custom suspension manufacturer Bright Racing Shocks have updated their short travel fork for 2021, releasing the 5th Generation F929 xCO. This is the top-end racing model with 35mm stanchions telescoping through 46mm carbon uppers.
